channel.title: Series on Mike Webb Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Mike Webb Tech

item.title: My Hugo Site
item.description: How I am creating this site using the HUGO Static Site Generator framework

item.title: Introduction to Cyber Security
item.description: This series is based on course notes and offers my high-level overview of cybersecurity fundamentals. I examine core principles and activities that protect digital assets, from establishing core security controls to managing threats, vulnerabilities, and risks. This series should provides a good introduction to key concepts and application within a difined framework.

item.title: Proxmox as Code
item.description: Spinning up dev labs and other Virtualised infrastructure on Proxmox using automation and infrastructure As Code.
